johnston_group_australia.overview: The Johnston groups australia is a collective of specialised companies offering services in lifting, equipment hire, inspection, maintenance, and supply. Their capabilities include managing all types of mobile cranes, forklifts, EWP (Elevated Work Platforms), trucks, excavators, and more. They also provide training, certification, and safety inspections. Learn more at https://www.nwtis.com.au

nwtis.name: North West Training and Inspection Services (NWTIS)
nwtis.overview: NWTIS was established in the late 1980s to provide specialised inspection services to the mining, oil, gas, and industrial sectors. Based in the Pilbara, it has been a reliable provider of lifting equipment inspections and training.
services: Confined space entry and working at heights training
Mechanical inspections for classified and designated machinery

liftequipt.name: Liftequipt
liftequipt.overview: Liftequipt is a privately owned, Pilbara-based materials handling and equipment hire service provider. They specialize in innovative solutions, service excellence, and on-time delivery.
services: Equipment hire including generators, trailers, and pressure washers
locations: Unit 1/4 Sobek Pass, Bibra Lake WA 6163
1498 Lambert Rd, Karratha Industrial Estate WA 6714

bbs_forks.name: BBS Forks Australia
bbs_forks.overview: BBS Forks Australia is a WA-based materials handling company that focuses on high-quality products, support, and service for equipment and industrial needs.

nw_oil_filters.name: North West Oil and Filter Supplies
nw_oil_filters.overview: An independent supplier of premium oils and filters servicing Karratha and surrounding areas. Originally established to support Johnston Group fleets, it now caters to a broader market.
services: Supply of oils and filters for various applications
